title: Stunning renovated 3 bed, 2 bath! Gorgeous floors, kitchens, & more
posting_body: ['Come home to a great community - Walden Brook!', 'Address:', '100 Walden Brook Drive', 'Lithonia, GA 30038', 'Beds:', '3  /', 'Baths:', '2 /', 'Size:', '1425 - 1532 sq ft', 'Monthly Rent:', '$1994', "With a variety of floor plans to choose from, we're certain there's one that's just right for you.", 'Browse our one, two, and three bedroom floor plans.', 'Security Deposit:', 'Call', 'Length of Lease:', '6-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month', 'show contact info', 'Property Features:', '● BBQ/Picnic Area', '● Conference Room', '● Fitness Center', '● Gameroom', '● Gated entry', '● Laundry Facility', '● Multi Use Room', '● Porch', '● Resort Style Swimming Pool w/Cabana', '● Sprinkler System', '● Car Care Center', '● Detached garages', '● Lake view', '● Online Services', '● Package Service', '● Planned Social Activities', '● Property Manager on Site', '● Public Transportation', '● Sundeck', '● Wi-Fi at Pool and Clubhouse', 'Apartment Amenities:', '● Air Conditioning', '● Dining Room', '● Disposal', '● Handrails', '● Office', '● Oven', '● Patio or Balcony', '● Sprinkler System', '● Trash Compactor', '● Window Coverings', '● 9 foot ceiling', '● Contemporary floor plans', '● Deck', '● Fully equipped modern kitchens', '● Hardwood Floors', '● High Speed Internet Access', '● Recreation Room', '● Upgrade Unit', '● Views', '● Walk-In Closets', 'Pets:', 'A maximum of 2 pet per unit shall be accepted.', 'The pet fee is $300 Non-Refundable per pet.', 'A pet addendum must be completed and pet fees must be paid prior to moving in.', 'If there is more than one pet per unit, the combined weight of the 2 pets cannot exceed 50lbs.', 'Business Hours:', 'Mon - Fri: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM', 'Sat: 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM', 'Sun: 1:00 PM - 5:00 PM', 'Ready to Lease?', 'Call our office at', 'show contact info', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Proudly managed by Ventron Management', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', '2FF46CF1E7DD47']
